math.geom2d
Class PolyCurve2D

java.lang.Object
  math.geom2d.CurveSet2D
      math.geom2d.PolyCurve2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, ContinuousCurve2D, Curve2D, Shape2D
Direct Known Subclasses:
PolyBezierCurve2D, PolyOrientedCurve2D
public class PolyCurve2D
extends CurveSet2D
implements ContinuousCurve2D

A PolyCurve2D is a set of piecewise smooth curve arcs, such that the end of a curve is the beginning of the next curve, and such that they do not intersect nor self-intersect.

Author:
dlegland

getSubCurve

public Curve2D getSubCurve(double t0,
                           double t1)
Return an instance of PolyCurve2D. If t0>t1 and curve is not closed, return a PolyCurve2D without cures inside.

Specified by:
getSubCurve in interface Curve2D
Overrides:
getSubCurve in class CurveSet2D
Parameters:
t0 - position of the start of the subcurve
t1 - position of the end of the subcurve
Returns:
the portion of origal curve comprised between t0 and t1.
